events.message: The applicant submitted their personal loan request to cover upcoming medical expenses and is seeking timely approval for coverage.
The loan application was categorized under Personal Loan due to keywords indicating medical and personal expense coverage.
A loan officer was assigned to the file to ensure thorough review and to guide the applicant through the process efficiently.
Initial review of the loan application and supporting information was conducted to check for completeness and initial eligibility.
Requested additional documentation from the applicant including medical bills, proof of income, and identification for verification.
Applicant promptly submitted all the requested documents including recent pay stubs, medical invoices, and photo ID.
Completed credit check which showed the applicant has a stable credit history but some existing minor debts.
Risk assessment carried out indicating a moderate risk due to existing debts but satisfactory repayment capacity.
Loan offer was presented to the applicant outlining the terms, interest rate, and repayment schedule for the personal loan.
Applicant responded positively to the loan offer and requested clarification on repayment options and interest calculations.
Application was escalated to senior management due to the applicant requesting a longer repayment term.
Loan was approved with agreed terms including a slightly extended repayment period and adjusted interest rate.
Funds were disbursed to the applicantâ€™s account promptly to cover the medical expenses as planned.
Follow-up call made to ensure the applicant is satisfied with the loan arrangement and to answer any further questions.
The loan application process was officially closed after successful funding and client confirmation of satisfaction.
